pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Friday, July 1, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

National Capital Region, Canada

Private meetings

11:35 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in an Indigenous Reflection Ceremony. Minister of Canadian Heritage and Quebec Lieutenant Pablo Rodriguez will also be in attendance.

LeBreton Flats Park

Note for media:

  • Pooled coverage

11:45 a.m. The Prime Minister and Sophie Grégoire Trudeau will attend the Canada Day Daytime Ceremony. Minister of Canadian Heritage and Quebec Lieutenant Pablo Rodriguez will also be in attendance.

LeBreton Flats Park

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage for accredited media
  • Accreditation inquiries may be directed to:
    Pierre Cuguen, Manager, Press Events
    Parliamentary Press Gallery
    pierre.cuguen@parl.gc.ca

Media appearances

11:56 a.m. An interview with the Prime Minister will air live on CBC.

11:58 a.m. An interview with the Prime Minister will air live on Radio-Canada.
